faq.question: What is DevOps?
faq.answer: DevOps is a combination of development and operations practices focused on automation, CI/CD, containerization, cloud technologies, and continuous monitoring.

faq.question: Do I need coding knowledge?
faq.answer: No. Basic understanding of computers is enough. We teach everything from zero.

faq.question: Which tools will I learn?
faq.answer: You will learn Git, Linux, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform, AWS, Prometheus, Grafana, and more.

faq.question: Do you provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes. UNIQ Technologies provides 100% placement support with mock interviews and job referrals.

faq.question: Will I work on real-time projects?
faq.answer: Yes. You will work on CI/CD pipelines, Docker container deployment, and Kubernetes cluster setup.

faq.question: Can I switch between offline and online mode?
faq.answer: Yes. You can attend in either mode anytime without extra charges.

faq.question: What is the duration of the DevOps course?
faq.answer: The complete course duration is around 2–3 months depending on batch type.

faq.question: Is DevOps a good career in 2025?
faq.answer: Absolutely! DevOps roles are among the highest-paying in the cloud & infrastructure domain.

faq.question: Do I get certificates?
faq.answer: Yes. You will receive Course Completion and Internship Certificates.
